getRoadInfo

private java.lang.String getRoadInfo(java.lang.String mixed_info)
Get pure road info from mixed info. mixed_info is in format like "XXX - YYY", we get XXX and return

参数：
mixed_info - in format: "XXX - YYY", like "Dragon Road - 300m"
返回：
pure road info

getDistanceInfo

private java.lang.String getDistanceInfo(java.lang.String mixed_info)
Get distance info from mixed info. mixed_info is in format like "XXX - YYY", we get YYY and return

参数：
mixed_info, - in format: "XXX - YYY", like "Dragon Road - 300m"
返回：
distance info (use ?? for invalid)

updateCurrentDistance

public void updateCurrentDistance(java.lang.String dist)
Update the interface with new distance info

参数：
dist - distance info in String

Decode a bitmap from resource

参数：
direction_index - varies from RouteDirectionConstants
返回：
bitmap of navigation direction

addNode

public void addNode(int _index,
                    java.lang.String _str)
Add a new node to the tail of current node list

参数：
_index - navigation direction index, see RouteDirectionConstants
_str - navigation message

Remove a node from current node list

参数：
node_index - index of the node to be remove

public void removeFirst()

getSuitableWidth

private int getSuitableWidth()
Get suitable width of layout. 1. In SINGLE_STRIP mode, just measure the first navigation message 2. In MULTI_STRIP mode, calculate the maximal width

返回：
suitable width of layout

getSuitableHeight

private int getSuitableHeight()
Get suitable height of layout.

返回：
suitable height of layout

getSingleStripHeight

private int getSingleStripHeight()
Calculate single strip height. h = total text height + vertical margin

返回：
single strip height

private int measureWidth(int measureSpec)
Determines the width of this view

参数：
measureSpec - A measureSpec packed into an int
返回：
The width of the view, honoring constraints from measureSpec

measureSpec - A measureSpec packed into an int

The height of the view, honoring constraints from measureSpec

getTextWidth

private int getTextWidth(java.lang.String txt,
                         Paint p)
Return width of the String to be drawn

参数：
txt - String to be measured
p - paint to draw the text
返回：
width(in pixels) of the String to be drawn

getCenterAlignBaseline

private int getCenterAlignBaseline(int H,
                                   Paint p)
Return the baseline of text Paint when align to H vertically

参数：
H - height to put text
p - text paint
返回：
baseline of text to be drawn within H
